org.grouplens.lenskit.iterative

Class IterationCountStoppingCondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.iterative.IterationCountStoppingCondition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, StoppingCondition

    @Immutable
@Shareable
public class IterationCountStoppingCondition
extends Object
implements StoppingCondition, Serializable

    Stop once the iteration count has reached a value.
